pinyin: zhè shì gè yòng zhè gè guó jiā qián suǒ wèi jiàn de, huán rào xué xiào、 jiào táng de wú shù rén lóng, suǒ shuō chū de dá àn. zhè xiē rén kǔ děng sān, sì gè xiǎo shí tóu piào, xǔ duō rén hái shì shēng píng tóu yī cì, yīn wèi tā men xiāng xìn, zhè cì yī dìng yào bù yī yàng, tā men de shēng yīn jiù shì míng zhèng.

chinese: 今晚稍早，我接到马侃参议员打来，态度非常恳切的电话。马侃参议员已打完一场漫长艰苦的选战。他为这个他所热爱的国家所打的仗更久，更艰苦。他为美国的奉献牺牲，是我们多数同胞难以想像的。因为有他这位勇敢无私的领袖的奉献，我们才能过比较好的日子。
pinyin: jīn wǎn shāo zǎo, wǒ jiē dào mǎ kǎn cān yì yuán dǎ lái, tài dù fēi cháng kěn qiè de diàn huà. mǎ kǎn cān yì yuán yǐ dǎ wán yī chǎng màn zhǎng jiān kǔ de xuǎn zhàn. tā wèi zhè gè tā suǒ rè ài de guó jiā suǒ dǎ de zhàng gèng jiǔ, gèng jiān kǔ. tā wèi měi guó de fèng xiàn xī shēng, shì wǒ men duō shù tóng bāo nán yǐ xiǎng xiàng de. yīn wèi yǒu tā zhè wèi yǒng gǎn wú sī de lǐng xiù de fèng xiàn, wǒ men cái néng guò bǐ jiào hǎo de rì zi.
english: Earlier this evening, I received a phone call from Senator Ma Kan. The attitude of the call was very sincere. Senator Ma Kan has just finished a long and difficult election campaign. The fight he fought for this country he loves was longer and harder. His dedication and sacrifice for the United States is unimaginable for most of our compatriots. It is because of the dedication of this brave and selfless leader that we are able to live relatively good days.

chinese: 我要感谢我的选举搭档，这位先生全心全意竞选，为与他在史克兰顿街头一起长大的男男女女代言。在前往德拉瓦州的路上，和我一起以火车为家，他就是副总统当选人，拜登先生。
pinyin: Wǒ yào gǎnxiè wǒ de xuǎnjǔ dāpáng, zhè wèi xiānshēng quánxīn quányì jìngxuǎn, wèi yǔ tā zài shǐkèlándùn jiētóu yīqǐ zhǎngdà de nán nán nǚ nǚ dàiyán. Zài qiánwǎng délāwǎzhōu de lù shàng, hé wǒ yīqǐ yǐ huǒchē wéi jiā, tā jiùshì fùzǒngtǒng dāngxuǎnrén, Bàidēng xiānshēng.
english: I want to thank my running mate, Mr. Biden, who campaigned wholeheartedly and spoke for the men and women who grew up with him on the streets of Scranton. On the way to Delaware, where we made our home on a train together, he is the vice president-elect, Mr. Biden.

chinese: 如果没有我过去１６年最好的朋友、我们家庭的中坚、我生命中的挚爱，我今天晚上不可能站在这里，美国下一位第一夫人米歇尔-奥巴马。
pinyin: Rúguǒ méiyǒu wǒ guòqù 16 nián zuìhǎo de péngyǒu, wǒmen jiātíng de zhōngjiān, wǒ shēngmìng zhōng de zhì'ài, wǒ jīntiān wǎnshàng bùkěnéng zhàn zài zhèlǐ, Měiguó xià yī wèi dì-yī fūrén Mǐxiē'ěr-Àobāmǎ.
english: If it weren't for my best friend of the past 16 years, the rock of our family, the love of my life, I wouldn't be standing here tonight as the next First Lady of the United States, Michelle Obama.

chinese: 但我将总是会向你们坦陈我们所面临的挑战。我会听取你们的意见，尤其是存在不同意见的时候。最重要的是，我会请求你们参与重建这个国家，以美国221年来从未改变的唯一方式-一砖一瓦、同心协力。
pinyin: dàn wǒ jiāng zǒng shì huì xiàng nǐ men tǎn chén wǒ men suǒ miàn lín de tiǎo zhàn. wǒ huì tīng qǔ nǐ men de yì jiàn, yóu qí shì cún zài bù tóng yì jiàn de shí hòu. zuì zhòng yào de shì, wǒ huì qǐng qiú nǐ men cān yù chóng jiàn zhè ge guó jiā, yǐ měi guó 221 nián lái cóng wèi gǎi biàn de wéi yī fāng shì - yī zhuān yī wǎ, tóng xīn xié lì.
english: But I will always be honest with you about the challenges we face. I will listen to your opinions, especially when there are differences. Most importantly, I will ask for your participation in rebuilding this country, in the only way America has never changed in 221 years - brick by brick, together.

chinese: 这次大选创造了多项第一，也诞生了很多将世代流传的故事。但是今天晚上令我难忘的却是在亚特兰大投票的一名妇女：安-尼克松-库波尔。她和其他数百万排队等待投票的选民没有什么差别，除了一点：她已是１０６岁的高龄。
pinyin: zhè cì dà xuǎn chuàngzàole duō xiàng dìyī, yě dànshēngle hěnduō jiāng shìdài liúchuán de gùshì. Dànshì jīntiān wǎnshàng lìng wǒ nánwàng de quèshì zài Yàtèlándà tóupiào de yī míng fùnǚ: ān-níkèsēn-kùbōěr. Tā hé qítā shǔ bǎi wàn páiduì děngdài tóupiào de xuǎnmín méiyǒu shénme chābié, chúle yīdiǎn: tā yǐ shì 106 suì de gāolíng.
english: This election has created many firsts and given birth to many stories that will be handed down for generations. But what made tonight unforgettable for me was a lady in Atlanta who was voting: Ann Nixon Cooper. She was no different from the millions of other voters waiting in line, except for one thing: she was already 106 years old.

chinese: 当３０年代的沙尘暴和大萧条使人们感到绝望时，她看到一个国家用新政、新的就业机会以及对新目标的共同追求战胜恐慌。是的，我们能做到。
pinyin: Dāng sān shí niándài de shā chén bào hé dà xiāo tiáo shī rén men gǎn dào jué wàng shí, tā kàn dào yí gè guó jiā yòng xīn zhèng, xīn de jiù yè jī huì yǐ jí duì xīn mù biāo de gòng tóng zhuī qiú zhàn shèng kǒng huāng. Shì de, wǒ men néng zuò dào.
english: When the dust storms and Great Depression of the 1930s left people feeling hopeless, she saw a nation overcome fear with new policies, new job opportunities, and a shared pursuit of new goals. Yes, we can do it.

chinese: 今年，在这场选举中，她用手指触摸屏幕投下自己的选票，因为在美国生活了１０６年之后，经历了最好的时光和最黑暗的时刻之后，她知道美国如何能够发生变革。
pinyin: Jīnnián, zài zhè chǎng xuǎnjǔ zhōng, tā yòng shǒuzhǐ chùmō píngmù tóuxià zìjǐ de xuǎnpiào, yīnwèi zài měiguó shēnghuó le 106 nián zhīhòu, jīnglì le zuì hǎo de shíguāng hé zuì hēi'àn de shíkè zhīhòu, tā zhīdào měiguó rúhé nénggòu fāshēng biànzhé.
english: This year, in this election, she cast her vote by touching the screen with her finger, because after living in the United States for 106 years and experiencing the best and darkest moments, she knew how America could bring about change.
